entries.question: Does the account of creation agree with this?
entries.authorNote: The use of the pronoun "us" indicates that there was more than one engaged in the work ofcreation. Christians believe that there were three engaged in creation for Genesis 1:2 speaks of the Spirit of God as being present also.

entries.question: WHEN DID HE APPEAR IN THIS WORLD?
Does the Bible teach that Christ had an eternal existence?
